definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello

sentences.english: Good morning, boys and girls. Nice to see you. I am Mrs Zhou .
sentences.chinese: 同学们早上好，我是周老师，见到你们很高兴。

sentences.english: Good morning, this is the Sanxia Airport, may I help you?
sentences.chinese: 早上好，这里是三峡机场，我能为你做点什么？

sentences.english: Good morning. Jiahe restaurant. May I help you?
sentences.chinese: 早上好，嘉禾饭店，我可以帮你吗？

sentences.english: Good morning, sir, This is Le Salon. May I help you?
sentences.chinese: 早上好，先生，这里是美容室我能帮你做什么？

sentences.english: Good morning. Housekeeping . May I help you?
sentences.chinese: 早上好，客房部。需要我效劳吗？

sentences.english: Good morning. East Sea Fishing Village. May I help you?
sentences.chinese: 早上好，东海渔村酒楼，你需要什么？

sentences.english: Agent: Good morning, sir. Can I help you?
sentences.chinese: 早上好，先生。请问有什么可以帮您？

sentences.english: B. Gooding morning. How are you?
Good morning, Lower Manhattan Development Corporation, LMDC.
sentences.chinese: 早上好，曼哈顿下城发展公司。

sentences.english: Good morning, I am Li Hua from Tianjin, China .
sentences.chinese: 早上好，我是李华从天津中国。

sentences.english: AGood Morning, sir. What can I do for you?
sentences.chinese: 早上好，先生。请问有什么可以帮助您？

sentences.english: Good morning, Mrs. Peterson. Hi, Trixy.
sentences.chinese: 早上好，皮特森夫人，嗨，特里克西。
第三部分早上好，请坐吧。

sentences.english: Morning David, this is Li Lin.
sentences.chinese: 大卫，早上好，我就是李林。

definition: best quality/item of the highest quality/(slang) outrageous/annoying in the extreme/gross/person with these qualities
sth of good quality/good person (usu. in the negative)/(Tw) delicious food
a good deal of/quite a lot
to be on good terms/to be close friends/striving for self-improvement
